Inbox

  • Here you can write disorganised notes to be categorised later
  • Bullet points are useful, but it could be free form text as well
  • Sometimes it‚Äôs better to just get things off your mind quickly, rather than stop to think where it belongs
  • But don‚Äôt let this list get too long
  • Move information to more specific documents and link to them.
    • This helps you navigate between documents quickly
    • For example, you can Cmd+Click this: [todo]
  • Some notes don‚Äôt end up making sense the next day
  • That‚Äôs ok, you can just delete them!
    • You can always find them in your git history, if you really need it!
